bulk.name: Chicken and Rice
instructions: Cook the rice as per instructions.
Grill the chicken.
Steam the broccoli.

bulk.name: Grilled Cheese
ingredients: 2 slices of full fat cheddar cheese
instructions: Lay the bread slices on a clean surface.
Place the cheese slices on one piece of bread. Ensure the cheese covers the entire slice.
If using, place avocado slices and ham on top of the cheese.
Spread a generous layer of butter on one side of each slice of bread. The buttered sides will be on the outside to help create a golden, crispy crust.
Place the non-buttered side of the cheese-topped bread slice onto the buttered side of the other bread slice, forming a sandwich with the buttered sides facing outwards.
Place a skillet or frying pan on the stove over medium heat. Allow it to heat up for a minute or two.
Place the assembled sandwich in the hot skillet. Cook for about 3-4 minutes on one side, or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese starts to melt.
Carefully flip the sandwich using a spatula and cook for another 3-4 minutes on the other side, until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is fully melted.
Remove the grilled cheese from the skillet and let it cool for a minute.
Slice in half if desired and enjoy your warm, melty grilled cheese sandwich.

snacks.name: Skyrr Yoghurt
instructions: Just eat it..

snacks.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
instructions: Place the Greek yogurt in a bowl.
Top with mixed berries.
Sprinkle chia seeds over the top.
Enjoy immediately as a refreshing, high-protein snack.
snacks.label: cutting

snacks.name: PB & Banana Protein Smoothie
instructions: Place the banana, peanut butter, protein powder, milk, and Greek yogurt in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes if desired and blend again until smooth.
Pour into a glass and enjoy your high-protein, calorie-dense smoothie.
snacks.label: bulking

cut.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Rub the chicken breast with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side or until fully cooked and no longer pink inside.
Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin strips.
In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens, cucumber, bell pepper, red onion, and cherry tomatoes.
Top the salad with the grilled chicken strips.
Drizzle the balsamic vinaigrette over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately and enjoy your high-protein, low-calorie meal.
